Label: Stock Symbol
Detailed Description: Unique identifier for the stock
Chart Suggestion: Pie chart (distribution of stocks in dataset)

Label: 50-Day Moving Average
Detailed Description: The average closing price over the past 50 trading days

Label: 200-Day Moving Average
Detailed Description: The average closing price over the past 200 trading days

Label: MACD
Detailed Description: Moving Average Convergence Divergence (momentum indicator)

Label: Previous Date
Detailed Description: The date of the previous data point

Label: Date
Detailed Description: The date associated with the data point

Label: 3-Day Moving Average
Detailed Description: The average closing price over the past 3 trading days

Label: 7-Day Moving Average
Detailed Description: The average closing price over the past 7 trading days

Label: Previous MACD
Detailed Description: The MACD value from the previous data point

Label: MACD Change
Detailed Description: The change in MACD value since the previous data point

Label: DMA Difference
Detailed Description: The difference between shorter and longer DMAs (e.g., 50dma - 200dma)

Label: Weekly 3-Day Moving Average
Detailed Description: The average weekly closing price over the past 3 weeks

Label: Weekly 7-Day Moving Average
Detailed Description: The average weekly closing price over the past 7 weeks

Label: Weekly 50-Day Moving Average
Detailed Description: The average weekly closing price over the past 50 weeks

Label: Weekly 200-Day Moving Average
Detailed Description: The average weekly closing price over the past 200 weeks

Label: Weekly MACD
Detailed Description: MACD calculated over a weekly timeframe

Label: Weekly Previous MACD
Detailed Description: The previous week's MACD value

Label: Weekly MACD Change
Detailed Description: The change in MACD value since the previous week

Label: Weekly DMA Difference
Detailed Description: The difference between shorter and longer weekly DMAs

Label: Previous DMA Difference
Detailed Description: DMA difference value of the previous data point

Label: Previous Week's DMA Difference
Detailed Description: The DMA difference value from two weeks ago

Label: Previous Week's MACD
Detailed Description: The MACD value from two weeks ago

Label: 3-Day Moving Average (2 periods ago)
Detailed Description: The 3-day moving average calculated two data points in the past

Label: Weekly 3-DMA (2 periods ago)
Detailed Description: The weekly 3-day moving average calculated two weeks ago

Label: Momentum
Detailed Description: Rate of change of price for a specific (short) period

Label: Weekly Momentum
Detailed Description: Rate of change of price over a weekly timeframe

Label: Monthly 3-Day Moving Average
Detailed Description: Monthly 3-Day Moving Average

Label: Monthly 7-Day Moving Average
Detailed Description: Monthly 7-Day Moving Average

Label: Monthly 3-DMA (Prev. Month)
Detailed Description: Monthly 3-DMA (Prev. Month)

Label: Monthly MACD
Detailed Description: Monthly MACD

Label: Monthly Previous MACD
Detailed Description: Monthly Previous MACD

Label: Monthly DMA Difference
Detailed Description: Monthly DMA Difference

Label: Monthly 50-Day Moving Average
Detailed Description: Monthly 50-Day Moving Average

Label: Prev. Month's DMA Difference
Detailed Description: Prev. Month's DMA Difference

Label: Monthly Momentum
Detailed Description: Monthly Momentum

Label: 13-Day Moving Average
Detailed Description: 13-Day Moving Average

Label: Weekly 13-Day Moving Average
Detailed Description: Weekly 13-Day Moving Average

Label: Monthly 13-Day Moving Average
Detailed Description: Monthly 13-Day Moving Average

Label: 13-Day Moving Average (Prev. Period)
Detailed Description: 13-Day Moving Average (Prev. Period)

Label: Weekly 13-DMA (Prev. Week)
Detailed Description: Weekly 13-DMA (Prev. Week)

Label: Monthly 13-DMA (Prev. Month)
Detailed Description: Monthly 13-DMA (Prev. Month)

Label: 3-Day Moving Average (3 periods ago)
Detailed Description: The 3-day moving average calculated three data points in the past

Label: Weekly 3-DMA (3 periods ago)
Detailed Description: The weekly 3-day moving average calculated three weeks ago

Label: Custom Score
Detailed Description: Calculated score, potentially combining technical factors
Chart Suggestion: Bar chart, scatter plot, line chart (to track changes over time)

Label: Previous Custom Score
Detailed Description: The custom score from the previous data point
Chart Suggestion: Line chart (to track changes over time)

Label: Score Calculation Date
Detailed Description: The date on which the custom score was calculated

Label: Dynamic 3-Day MA
Detailed Description: Moving average with length adjusted based on volatility

Label: Weekly Dynamic 3-Day
Detailed Description: The dynamic 3-day moving average value every week

Label: Previous Dynamic 3-Day MA
Detailed Description: The dynamic 3-day moving average value from the previous data point

Label: Weekly Prev. Dynamic 3-DMA
Detailed Description: The previous week's dynamic 3-day moving average

Label: Custom Score Change
Detailed Description: The change in the custom score since the previous data point
Chart Suggestion: Line chart (to track changes over time), bar chart (for magnitude comparison)

Label: Most Recent Custom Score
Detailed Description: The most recent value of the custom score
